name: Casino Bounce
description:
Buncer, a bunny bouncer and dealer in a casino, is needing to collect as many chips as they can!

Being a bunny though and a casino worker, their jumps are dictated by a dice roll. However, Buncer can gain more height by using the power meter!

Don't lose the chips, or it's game over! Need a boost in chips, try your chance at cards! 2 or 3 of a kind will get you more chips, watch out for the joker card!

Game submitted to the Game Makers ToolKit 2022 Game Jam.
